entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
